data.title: To Better Times
data.meta_description: "To Better Times" is an unreleased song by Allie X. It was recorded in 2015. The song was intended for inclusion on CollXtion II and is rumored to have been reworked to "Better Times". It leaked online in late 2016 in low-quality, and a higher-quality version leaked months later in early 2017...
data.text:
[Chorus]

So, one for the boy who let me down

Two, for the hoe who took 'em out

I'm a lightweight, drunk off heartbreak

Three, for the times he held me back

Four, for the major part he lacked

Let's drink tonight, to better times

[Verse 1]

My mama always told me as a little girl

Never fall in love with a bartender

(Liquor and long hours)

But you had lot of swag and a handsome face

I couldn't help myself, I did it anyway

(I'm bitter, sweet and sour)

[Pre-Chorus]

So let's drop in, drop in

I'm buying, buying

I didn't eat today, that's okay

There's cherries in my cocktail

I'll get white girl wasted

I'll forget what you did

Forget the lies and shade you threw my way

(Yeah)

[Chorus]

So, one for the boy who let me down

Two, for the hoe who took 'em out

I'm a lightweight, drunk off heartbreak

Three, for the times he held me back

Four, for the major part he lacked

Let's drink tonight, to better times

[Verse 2]

I started realizing something wasn't right

You were grabbing cappuccinos every single night

(Caffeine isn't healthy)

The evidence was all over your Instagram

Flaunt it in my face like you don't give a damn

(Seriously, she's not pretty)

[Pre-Chorus]

So let's drop in, drop in

I'm buying, buying

I didn't eat today, that's okay

There's cherries in my cocktail

I'll get white girl wasted

I'll forget what you did

Forget the lies and shade you threw my way

(Yeah)

[Chorus]

So, one for the boy who let me down

Two, for the hoe who took 'em out

I'm a lightweight, drunk off heartbreak

Three, for the times he held me back

Four, for the major part he lacked

Let's drink tonight, to better times

[Outro]

Oh-oh, oh-oh

O-o-o-oh oh oh

O-o-o-oh oh oh

To better times

Oh-oh, oh-oh

O-o-o-oh oh oh

O-o-o-oh oh oh

To better times
